item.title: Mutual Fund Comparison
item.description: Mutual Fund A Features: Diversified portfolio, professional management Fees: 1.5% annual Performance: 10% average annual return over 5 years Risk Level: Moderate User Rating: 4.5/5 Learn More Mutual Fund B Features: Low-cost index fund Fees: 0.2% annual Performance: 8% average annual return over 5 years Risk Level: Low User Rating: 4.2/5 Learn More
